fundraise.title: 3. Start fundraising

Join a cause and set your goal!
Aim high and share your progress with
friends and family.
fundraise.description_charity:
Aim high and share your progress
with friends and family. Your
donations go directly to WWF’s
vital conservation work.

welcome.title: A challenging game
welcome.text: Mountain Rush promotes physical activity and local exploration in a fun package: alone or with friends, raising funds for a cause or just for fun. Try it now for free!
